author: Kevin Breuninger
title: Georgia's primary elections on Tuesday are pivotal. Here's what to watch

sentence: 2 hr ago 19:27 PM EDT Stacey Abrams Wins Georgia's Democratic Primary for Govenor Stacey Abrams has again won the Democratic primary for governor of Georgia, setting up a potential rematch with Republican Brian Kemp.

title: Primary Live Updates: Sarah Huckabee Sanders Wins Arkansas Governor Primary
